reviews.review_content:
Dr. Hazelrigg is an amazing professor! She knows her stuff and loves sharing what she knows with the students. The content is not super easy and Dr. Hazelrigg prepares for this by constantly making sure the class is understanding what she's saying. With her engaging lectures and following the readings, anyone should be able to do well in this class.
Workload:
One Final Exam
Three Mini-Exams
One Workshop Presentation
